item.description:
9/17 and 10/2: We'll meet at the library on the right side of the lobby by the benches until everyone has arrived!

This will be the first of a series of introductory meetings for members who want to learn about the power of referral based business. We will be taking applications from individuals from different professions to fill each seat for the final group. Bring business cards, resumes and information on your business. Below are examples of the professions we are looking for:

Accountant
Architect
Attorney
Auto repair
Auto sales
Carpet Cleaner
Caterer
Chiropractor
Cleaning service
Computer sales and services
Dentist
DJ
Electrician
Event Planner
Hair Dresser
Heating/ AC contractor
Interior Design
Landscaper
Marketing consultant
Mortgage Broker
Moving Company
Optometrist
Photographer
Physical Therapist
Plumber
Psychotherapist
Public Relations
Real Estate
Travel agent

Don't hesitate to email me with questions!

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Introductory Meeting, All Welcome
